meanings.definition: To lay or place on top of something else.
meanings.sent1: I will superlay the book on the table.
meanings.sent2: She likes to superlay her clothes neatly in the drawer.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to superlay its toy on the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent4: The chef will superlay the sauce on the dish like a painter adding colors to a canvas.
meanings.sent5: Please superlay the blanket on the bed to make it cozy.

meanings.definition: To lay or place something on top of something else.
meanings.sent1: Can you superlay the plate on the shelf?
meanings.sent2: He always superlays his tools on the workbench after using them.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to superlay the acorn on the tree branch but missed.
meanings.sent4: The clouds seemed to superlay the sky with a blanket of gray.
meanings.sent5: Remember to superlay the lid on the jar tightly to keep the food fresh.

meanings.definition: Laid or placed on top of something else.
meanings.sent1: The superlay book rested on the desk.
meanings.sent2: The superlay blanket kept her warm during the cold night.
meanings.sent3: The superlay hat on his head made him look funny.
meanings.sent4: The superlay leaves on the ground created a colorful carpet.
meanings.sent5: The superlay cupcake on the plate looked delicious.
